      • x

        public final Hull x(DatumFunction<Double> xAccessor)
        Sets the x-coordinate accessor.

        The default accessor consider datum as a two element array and returns the first element.

        Parameters:
        xAccessor - the x accessor
        Returns:
        the current hull

      • y

        public final Hull y(DatumFunction<Double> yAccessor)
        Sets the y-coordinate accessor.

        The default accessor consider datum as a two element array and returns the first element.

        Parameters:
        yAccessor - the y accessor
        Returns:
        the current hull

      • apply

        public final <T> Array<T> apply(Array<T> vertices)
        Returns the convex hull for the specified vertices array, using the current x- and y-coordinate accessors.

        The returned convex hull is represented as an array containing a subset of the input vertices, arranged in counterclockwise order (for consistency with polygon.clip).

        Parameters:
        vertices - the array of vertices
        Returns:
        the convex hull as an array of vertices

      • apply

        public final <T> List<T> apply(List<T> vertices)
        Returns the convex hull for the specified vertices array, using the current x- and y-coordinate accessors.

        The returned convex hull is represented as an array containing a subset of the input vertices, arranged in counterclockwise order (for consistency with polygon.clip).

        Parameters:
        vertices - the array of vertices
        Returns:
        the convex hull as an array of vertices
